short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GTM Plus enables hotkeys and the utility features in the UI of the Google Tag Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyboard and UI shortcuts for prompting the search bar or launching the preview mode from anywhere in the interface of the GTM, thus enabling quicker and easier component editing and debugging experience. Additional hotkeys for creating and saving components. And, a button for sorting the tables with the parameters alphabetically.
